alert.note: Alert for Coastal Indian River; Coastal Martin; Inland Indian River; Okeechobee (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Watch issued June 03 at 3:37AM EDT until further notice by NWS Melbourne
info.description: ...FLOOD WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM NOON EDT TODAY THROUGH LATE SATURDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues to be possible. * WHERE...A portion of east central Florida, including the following areas, Coastal Indian River, Coastal Martin, Coastal Saint Lucie, Inland Indian River, Inland Martin, Inland Saint Lucie and Okeechobee. * WHEN...From Noon EDT today through late Saturday night. * IMPACTS...Excessive runoff may result in flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: You should monitor later forecasts and be alert for possible Flood Warnings. Those living in areas prone to flooding should be prepared to take action should flooding develop.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Indian River; Coastal Martin; Inland Indian River; Okeechobee
